caption.title: Training phase performance of the five pre-specified multi-model ensembles.
caption.p: The five ensembles tested were Equal Weights (EW), Constant Weights (CW), Target-Type Weights (TTW), Target Weights (TW), and Target-Region Weights (TRW). The models are sorted from simplest (left) to most complex (right), with the number of estimated weights (see Methods) for each model shown at the top. Each point represents the average forecast score for a particular season, with overall average across all seasons shown by the X.
